name: An Abstract Game
description:
You're a square who needs to get a circle to the end and throw into a hole before it becomes too bright or too big or you get too small from those pills coming for you. It's all abstract so it can't tell you what it means. 

Pills make square small if they're red and make the light circle bigger.

Pills can only be destroyed by squares while pills are green.

Press the up arrow to jump.

Press the left and right arrow to move left and right .

Press and hold the space bar next to the light circle to pick up the light circle . Let go of it to throw the circle. Be careful the light circle rolls.
